text: *** Bug 21020 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Found just one place at the moment:

 java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: java.
lang.StringBuffer: method append(Ljava/lang/StringBuffer;)
Ljava/lang/StringBuffer; not found
        at org.apache.xindice.tools.command.StringSerializer.
startElement(StringSerializer.java:234)
creator: tboehm@de.ibm.com

text:
If you compile XIndice using a JDK 1.3.1 the error is not occuring.
Because the call is replaced by the compiler with a StringBuffer.append(Object).
So a soution for this is, just to cast the parameter to Object, that the JDK 1.
4.1 compiler is also using the StringBuffer.append(Object).
